website_summaries.verdict: Excellent bat with a larger barrel at 2-5/8 inches, but it's pricey.
pros: Bat will deliver exactly the quality and level of pop and performance you'd expect to find in this price range
With a drop weight of -5 and a length of 33 inches, this bat works great for teenage players
Composite materials in the bat will give you a good lifespan
Uses a larger size of barrel that older players can handle well
cons: Very expensive bat so really only made for serious players

customer_reviews.title: Could be the best -5 bat ever.
customer_reviews.text: The 2017 -5 Zen will go down as one of the best bats ever made. My son swung the 32/27 this year and swung it like a boss. I just bought the 33/28 for next year. He will be in 8th grade playing 14u so he can still swing the -5 again next season is some usssa regular tournament but not in the NIT and other high level tounaments. Got to keep going forward in weight and legth to get ready for high school. This bat is very well balanced with the pop to back it up. I can't believe the zen was still available on amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cmfrtlynum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he does 12 U travel ball
customer_reviews.author: ania telleria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bat has great pop right out the wrapper. It will no disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Hot Bat
customer_reviews.text: Don’t listen to the negative reviews. This bat had tons of pop and power. This blows every other bat I have bought my son out of the water. The sound is very nice and it has a very balanced swing weight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent choice for my 13 year old grandson. He really likes the feel and balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First time used and bat started to chip outer casing, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: steven super

customer_reviews.title: Very poor experience and a total loss
customer_reviews.text: Snapped in half less than 20 swings in. Received a credit directly from Manufacturer that cannot replace the bat and will have to spend an extra $100 or more to buy something comparable directly from them. Very poor experience and a total loss.
customer_reviews.author: Marc D.

customer_reviews.title: Hot Bat - Homers Follow
customer_reviews.text: My son hit his first true homer with this bat this week at the first outside practice of the year. Loves the bat. I am disappointed, though, to learn that bats are going to be changed next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it. Great pop and according to my son not as ugly as it looks in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Baseball Really Pops Off This Bat
customer_reviews.text: All the kids on my boy's team use it......I hope it's durable with all the tossing it's getting after big hits
customer_reviews.author: Kenn Wright

customer_reviews.title: Hot Bat
customer_reviews.text: This bat should be banned. Check swing HR’s are a joke. When you see a whole team swing the same one bat, you know it’s hot. Doesn’t even sound like every other composite bat. Get this if you want a player to get a false sense of confidence and be forgiven for a sub standard swing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kurtz

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough good things about this bat
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this bat. My 13 year old son has had several bats over the years and Demarini are the most durable and provide the most pop in my opinion. The bat is very balanced which has made the shift from little league to senior league easier. A few of the big hitter on my son's team borrow the bat and producing well for them too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ballou

product_meta.title: DeMarini CF Zen Balanced(-5) 2 5/8" Baseball Bat
product_meta.description: Player-driven innovation has pushed DeMarini's new Senior League lineup of CF Series Composite bats to the next level. New for 2017, the 22% stronger Paraflex Composite barrel packs more of a punch and allows for a more precise weight distribution than ever, so we can create balanced and endloaded versions of our composite bats to better serve different players’ needs. The D-Fusion 2.0 handle reduces vibration and redirects energy back into the barrel, and the Low Pro End Cap and RCK Knob are optimized to help you bring it at the plate. You can find a bat to elevate your game, no matter what type of hitter you are. Your swing. Your choice.
